segments.text: I take in the details of this indoor kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink area, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is on, basin full, water cascading over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, stacks of dishes on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above shows a tidy garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets open, cookie jar inside on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a two-step stool, reaching into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands nearby, arm raised toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She appears to be waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures a moment of routine and play.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But suddenly, the overflow catches my eyeâ€”how startling!
segments.speaker: PAR
